person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The Security Council has to vote on a new secretary-general and then seek the endorsement of the 185-members General Assembly before December 31 when Boutros-Ghali 's term expires .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| Boutros-Ghali |

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions two people, "Security Council" and "General Assembly". However, these are not individual persons but rather collective entities. The only individual person mentioned is "Boutros-Ghali", who is the former Secretary-General of the United Nations, whose term is expiring on December 31. Therefore, the valid entity is "Boutros-Ghali".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| Boutros-Ghali |

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions two collective entities, "Security Council" and "General Assembly", which do not clearly refer to "Person". Therefore, these entities are removed. The only individual person mentioned is "Boutros-Ghali", who is the former Secretary-General of the United Nations, whose term is expiring on December 31. Therefore, the valid entity is "Boutros-Ghali".

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The Security Council has to vote on a new secretary-general and then seek the endorsement of the 185-members General Assembly before December 31 when Boutros-Ghali 's term expires .

Let's think step by step.

| Location   |
|------------|
| Security Council |
| General Assembly |
| December 31 (if considered as a location in time) |

Note: The term of Boutros-Ghali as Secretary-General is not a location, but a time period. However, I have included "December 31" as a possible location if it is considered as a location in time.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Location" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Location   |
|------------|
| Security Council |
| General Assembly |
| December 31 |

Note: I have removed "Boutros-Ghali's term" as it does not clearly refer to a location.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The Security Council has to vote on a new secretary-general and then seek the endorsement of the 185-members General Assembly before December 31 when Boutros-Ghali 's term expires .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| Security Council |
| General Assembly |
| United Nations (implied) |

Explanation:

1. "Security Council" is an organization that is responsible for maintaining international peace and security. It is a principal organ of the United Nations.
2. "General Assembly" is the main deliberative body of the United Nations, composed of representatives from all its member states.
3. "United Nations" is implied in the paragraph as the context of the election of the new secretary-general and the term expiration of Boutros-Ghali.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Organization" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| Security Council |
| General Assembly |

Explanation:

1. "Security Council" is an organization that is responsible for maintaining international peace and security. It is a principal organ of the United Nations.
2. "General Assembly" is the main deliberative body of the United Nations, composed of representatives from all its member states.

The other entity "December 31" is not an organization, but a date. Similarly, "Boutros-Ghali" is a name of a person, not an organization.
